SELECT S_T_SIGN_POINT_DEPT.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
insert into T_SIGN_POINT_DEPT (ID, SIGN_POINT_ID, DEPT_ID, BATCH_DATE, DELETED, CRE_PRO_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DATE, MOD_PRO_ID, LAST_MODIFIED_BY, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{signPointId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deptId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{batchDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleted,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{creProId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modProId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastModifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update T_SIGN_POINT_DEPT
SIGN_POINT_ID = #{signPointId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEPT_ID = #{deptId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BATCH_DATE = #{batchDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=CHAR},
CRE_PRO_ID = #{creProId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MOD_PRO_ID = #{modProId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_MODIFIED_BY = #{lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_MODIFIED_DATE = #{lastModifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update T_SIGN_POINT_DEPT set SIGN_POINT_ID = #{signPointId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEPT_ID = #{deptId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BATCH_DATE = #{batchDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=CHAR}, CRE_PRO_ID = #{creProId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MOD_PRO_ID = #{modProId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_MODIFIED_BY = #{lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE = #{lastModifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: SELECT TSPD.ID,TSPD.SIGN_POINT_ID,TSPD.DEPT_ID,TSPD.BATCH_DATE,TSPD.DELETED, TSPD.CRE_PRO_ID,TSPD.CREATED_BY,TSPD.CREATED_DATE, TSPD.MOD_PRO_ID,TSPD.LAST_MODIFIED_BY,TSPD.LAST_MODIFIED_DATE FROM T_SIGN_POINT_DEPT TSPD LEFT JOIN T_DEPT DEPT ON DEPT.ID=TSPD.DEPT_ID AND DEPT.DELETED=0 WHERE TSPD.SIGN_POINT_ID = #{signPointId}
